articles.description: Tata Consultancy Services, Gyscoal Alloys, JBF Industries, Shrenik, and Tijaria Polypipes will be among the stocks in focus as they declare their December quarter earnings today.
articles.content: Titan: Titan on Friday said that the firm saw healthy consumer demand due to the festive season which resulted in 12% growth in combined sales on year basis in the December quarter. The firm clocked … [+5530 chars]

articles.title: Goldman To Cut About 3,200 Jobs This Week After Cost Review - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is embarking on one of its biggest round of job cuts ever as it locks in on a plan to eliminate about 3,200 positions this week, with the bank's leadership going deeper than rivals to shed jobs.
articles.content:
The firm is expected to start the process mid-week.
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is embarking on one of its biggest round of job cuts ever as it locks in on a plan to eliminate about 3,200 positions thi… [+3980 chars]

articles.title: Video Of US Restaurants Rude Staff Roasting Customers Goes Viral - NDTV
articles.description: The clip was originally posted by TikToker @larissacai and the caption read, "This is how they served our food to us at Karen's Diner."
articles.content:
The chain has restaurants across Australia, New Zealand and the UK.

articles.title: Fairfax India former head, Kingfisher Airlines veteran plan regional airline Fly91 - The Economic Times
articles.description: The airline, Fly91 (91 for Indias country code) will be promoted by Manoj Chacko, who was the executive vice president at Kingfisher, chief operating officer and CEO, business travel at travel company SOTC. Chacko will also be CEO, Fly91.
articles.content: The man who set up the India business of Prem Watsas Fairfax Group and an aviation veteran from Vijay Mallyas once five star carrier Kingfisher Airlines are coming together to set up a regional carri… [+4587 chars]
